revised_title: The Evolution and Influence of Babylonian Astronomy in Antiquity
tldr: This article explores the development and impact of Babylonian astronomy in ancient civilizations. It discusses the unique characteristics of Babylonian mathematical astronomy and how it influenced subsequent scientific astronomy in the Hellenistic world, India, Islam, and the Latin West. The author also highlights the importance of various cycles in early astronomical practices and the use of these cycles in predicting celestial events.
